message: Let's make a deal! I take $60, you take $40. It's a good offer for you right now considering the inflation.
I think we can both do better. I'm offering you $45, and I'll take $55. Let's see if we can work something out before the inflation eats away at our gains!

Bob, time is running out and inflation is eating our money! My last offer was already generous considering the circumstances. I'm offering you $45, and I'll take $55.  Let's be reasonable and close this deal.
